    | text      = young people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:49.820
    | text      = I'm not busy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:51.259
    | text      = Ask me questions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:52.259
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.259
    | text      = So in order to correct for this, the researchers will need to give more weight to the answers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:56.840
    | text      = of people in the groups that are underrepresented in the set of answers so that they match the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:01.220
    | text      = demographic information of the area.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:03.740
    | text      = Generally taking that information from the most recent census.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:06.899
    | text      = This probably sounds overly simplified, but like realistically, the older you are, particularly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.360
    | text      = if you're white, the more likely it is that you identify as a Republican.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:16.220
    | text      = And older people are overrepresented in the raw respondent data of most polls.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:20.600
    | text      = The amount to which this needs to be fixed by weighting inevitably depends on the demographic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.480
    | text      = information that the poll takers bring in with their random sampling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:28.159
    | text      = So you'll see in write-ups of polls exactly the extent to which they weighted the numbers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.720
    | text      = Poll polling organizations conduct reviews on the raw data, the processed data, and everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:37.700
    | text      = in between that led from the raw to the processed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.519
    | text      = It's just how professional statistics work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.740
    | text      = Alex is just, he doesn't understand that very, very basic thing that he would understand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.539
    | text      = if he didn't drop out of junior college and actually took a statistics course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.700
    | text      = Yeah, or at least like send an email to Nate Silver, you know, like give it a shot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.620
    | text      = Or was curious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.620
    | text      = Curious would be really important there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.899
    | text      = I would appreciate some curiosity from him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.100
    | text      = Now the interesting thing, and I don't really know exactly how much this is going to play
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.600

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.600
    | text      = a possibility that even as the generations that are heavily Democrat now or left-leaning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.899
    | text      = get older, there's a chance that as in past generations, you'll see them skew more towards
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.460
    | text      = But if that doesn't happen, if you look at generational differences, Republicans and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.899

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:59.700
    | text      = And then you'll see conservative weighting being done and you shouldn't be suspicious
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.820

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.820
    | text      = That's just how this works.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.820

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:07.820

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.919
    | text      = absolutely have an influence on people's behavior.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:25.500
    | text      = If you see a poll, like for instance, for so many people during the Trump Hillary campaign,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.379

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.259

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.539
    | text      = But if your polling is not, is too inaccurate, people are just going to write it off immediately.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.100

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.019
    | text      = So if you want to say that polls can influence outcome, that is an argument that can be made.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
